error.message: Call to deprecated constant FILE_EXISTS_ERROR: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::EXISTS_ERROR.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated method validScheme() of class Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\StreamWrapper\StreamWrapperManagerInterface::isValidScheme() instead.
Call to deprecated function file_scan_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::scanDirectory() instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\UrlGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\devdocs\StreamWrapper\DocsStream. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Url instead.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to devdocs.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
